verbs.description: [ARG1: oklahoma child] [V: diagnosed] [ARG2: with rare polio - like illness] health officials in oklahoma say an oklahoma child has been diagnosed with a polio - like illness that is sweeping the country the centers for disease control and prevention say there have been 62 cases of the rare polio - like condition acute flaccid myelitis also known as afm this year the cases stretch across 22 states and most of the patients are children under the age of 18-years - old oklahoma illness
